languages.text: {n}Несколько тысяч невольников, активно участвовавших в бунте и убийстве коменданта, были выкурены газом, схвачены и преданы огненной казни в литейном прессе на глазах у прочих каторжан.{/n}

{n}Several thousand of the prisoners who actively partook in the riot and the warden's murder were smoked out with gas, seized, and executed in the fires of the foundry press in front of the rest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько тысяч невольников, активно участвовавших в бунте и убийстве коменданта, были выкурены газом, схвачены и преданы огненной казни в литейном прессе на глазах у прочих каторжан.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Several thousands of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized and were executed with fire inside the foundry press in front of other convicts.{/n}

{n}Several thousands of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized and were executed with fire inside the foundry press in front of other convicts.{/n}

{n}Several thousand of the prisoners who actively partook in the riot and the warden's murder were smoked out with gas, seized, and executed in the fires of the foundry press in front of the rest.{/n}

{n}Several thousand of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized, and executed, cremated in the fires of the foundry press, in front of other convicts.{/n}

{n}Several thousand of the prisoners that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized, and executed, cremated in the fires of the foundry press, in front of other convicts.{/n}

{n}Several thousand of the prisoners who actively partook in the riot and the warden's murder were smoked out with gas, seized, and executed in the fires of the foundry press in front of the rest.{/n}

{n}Several thousand of the prisoners who actively partook in the riot and the warden's murder were smoked out with gas, seized, and executed in the fires of the foundry press in front of the rest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}几千名积极参与暴乱、还谋杀了典狱长的囚犯纷纷被催眠气体熏倒。他们遭到了逮捕，随后在所有其他囚犯面前，被丢进铸造炉里活活烧死。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand of the prisoners who actively partook in the riot and the warden's murder were smoked out with gas, seized, and executed in the fires of the foundry press in front of the rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}几千名积极参与暴乱、还谋杀了典狱长的囚犯纷纷被催眠气体熏倒。他们遭到了逮捕，随后在所有其他囚犯面前，被丢进铸造炉里活活烧死。{/n}
{n}几千名积极参与暴乱、还谋杀了典狱长的囚犯纷纷被催眠气体熏倒。他们遭到了逮捕、处决。随后，他们的尸体被丢进了铸造炉里，在所有其他囚犯面前烧成了灰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los guardias usaron gas para sacar de sus escondites a miles de los prisioneros que participaron activamente en el motín y en el asesinato del alcaide, los apresaron y los ejecutaron en las llamas de la prensa de fundición, delante de los demás convictos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand of the prisoners who actively partook in the riot and the warden's murder were smoked out with gas, seized, and executed in the fires of the foundry press in front of the rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los guardias usaron gas para sacar de sus escondites a miles de los prisioneros que participaron activamente en el motín y en el asesinato del alcaide, los apresaron y los ejecutaron en las llamas de la prensa de fundición, delante de los demás convictos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}暴動と管理者の殺害に積極的に加担した数千人の囚人たちは、ガスで燻り出され、取り押さえられ、他の受刑者の前で、鋳造所のプレス機の火で火炙りの刑に処された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand of the prisoners who actively partook in the riot and the warden's murder were smoked out with gas, seized, and executed in the fires of the foundry press in front of the rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}暴動と管理者の殺害に積極的に加担した数千人の奴隷は、ガスで燻り出され、取り押さえられ、他の受刑者の前で、鋳造所のプレス機の火で火炙りの刑に処された。{/n}
{n}暴動と管理者の殺害に積極的に加担した数千人の奴隷は、ガスで燻り出され、取り押さえられ、他の受刑者の前で、鋳造所のプレス機の火で火炙りの刑に処された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plusieurs milliers de détenus ayant participé activement à l'émeute et au meurtre du directeur sont délogés au gaz, capturés, exécutés et incinérés dans les fourneaux de la fonderie devant les autres prisonniers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand of the prisoners who actively partook in the riot and the warden's murder were smoked out with gas, seized, and executed in the fires of the foundry press in front of the rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plusieurs milliers de détenus ayant participé activement à l'émeute et au meurtre du directeur sont délogés au gaz, capturés, exécutés et incinérés dans les fourneaux de la fonderie devant les autres prisonniers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mehrere tausend Gefangene, die aktiv an den Aufständen und der Ermordung des Direktors beteiligt waren, wurden mit Gas ausgeräuchert, festgenommen und vor den Augen der anderen in den Feuern der Gießereipresse verbrannt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand of the prisoners who actively partook in the riot and the warden's murder were smoked out with gas, seized, and executed in the fires of the foundry press in front of the rest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mehrere tausend Gefangene, die aktiv an den Aufständen und der Ermordung des Direktors beteiligt waren, wurden mit Gas ausgeräuchert, festgenommen und vor den Augen der anderen in den Feuern der Gießereipresse verbrannt.{/n}

{n}Mehrere tausend der Sklaven, die aktiv an den Aufständen und dem Mord am Direktor beteiligt gewesen waren, wurden mit Gas ausgeräuchert, festgenommen und hingerichtet. Vor den Augen der anderen Sträflinge wurden sie in den Feuern der Gießereipresse eingeäschert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İsyanda ve müdürün katlinde parmağı olan birkaç bin mahkûm, zehirli gazla saklandıkları yerlerden çıkarıldı. Ardından diğerlerinin gözü önünde idam edilen mahkûmlar, dökümhane presinin ateşlerinde yakıldı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand of the prisoners who actively partook in the riot and the warden's murder were smoked out with gas, seized, and executed in the fires of the foundry press in front of the rest.{/n}
